title: lag or dc in champ select?
body: I play on a mac.  I have a lot of problems sometimes with DC or long lag in champ select.  Sometimes I can't pick or ban or chat and I get sanctioned for leaving queues when I have just been unable to do anything.

replies.body: It sounds like you are losing sync during champion select, which is usually caused by network problems maintaining a connection to the server.  You should go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this right up.  It's important to get this fixed asap, otherwise you could incur more penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions.
